div.span: Youth Majestic New York Mets #44 John Mayberry Jr. Authentic BP Cool Base MLB Jersey - John Mayberry Jr

div.div: Maximize your comfort and style every time you wear the Youth Majestic New York Mets #44 John Mayberry Jr. Authentic Blue BP Cool Base MLB Jersey. Crafted with Cool Base technology, this jersey offers the same features the New York Mets rely on to maximize performance. Moisture-wicking fabric and engineered stretch at target spots enhances movement and ventilation to help you stay cool while you cheer on New York Mets this season. Support your New York Mets with this jersey. Support your favorite player, John Mayberry Jr, with his name and number across the back in authentic tackle twill decoration.

ul.li: Full button-front, On-Field MLB baseball jersey
Authentic tackle twill team wordmark or logo on front
Full back player name and number in printed tackle twill decoration
Additional number in printed tackle twill decoration on the front
MLB Authentic Collection Performance Apparel woven jock tag at bottom left
Cool Base performance technology provides extra comfort
Stretch mesh gussets under arms for enhanced range of motion
MLB batter patch at back neck
Fabric: Body - 100% moisture-wicking polyester; Under Arms - 82% nylon, 18% spandex
